content.description:
Engraving of sugar production on a plantation in the Spanish Caribbean, 1595, Theodor de Bry
Â© The Library Company of Philadelphia
content.question: Developments such as that depicted in the image most directly led to which of the following?

choices.label: The importation of enslaved Africans to the Caribbean
The increasing use of indentured servants in the Caribbean
The spread of Spanish missionaries into portions of Florida
The settling of the eastern North American seaboard by the Spanish

content.answer: The importation of enslaved Africans to the Caribbean

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
